---
title: "Clinvar and Chembl"
description: "Using biobricks to combine public data"
---

This project:  

  1. Makes a git repo with biobricks access
  2. Builds the chembl and clinvar bricks
  3. Shows a possible use case


**Make the Repo**  
Giving our analysis project biobricks capabilities is simple with [dvc](https://dvc.org/):
```{bash eval=F}
> mkdir my-analysis
> git init
> dvc init
```
